javax.microedition.io
Interface InputConnection

All Superinterfaces:
Connection
All Known Subinterfaces:
CommConnection, ContentConnection, HttpConnection, HttpsConnection, SecureConnection, SocketConnection, StreamConnection, FileConnection, Operation, ExtendedFileConnection, HttpServerConnection
All Known Implementing Classes:
BrowserFieldResponse, ByteArrayInputConnection
public interface InputConnection
extends Connection

This interface defines the capabilities that an input stream connection must have.

Blocking Operations

This interface performs blocking Input and Output operations. An application will lock if an implementation of this interface opens a connection from within the main event thread. Prevent an application from locking by opening a connection from within a thread that is separate from the main event thread. SeeConnector for more information.
